Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: justine solgat
Reviews.Content: this phone is great it has awesome picture quality and it is really good quality easy to use. the middle button is tuff sometimes but liveable if u set the menu to a list. love the keyboard!

Reviews.Title: Unfortunate first experience
Reviews.Author: M. Coon
Reviews.Content: The phone did not charge up, so had to return it.  It was my first attempt to buy a smart phone.  Disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Back cover won't stay on the phone!
Reviews.Author: flo
Reviews.Content: The phone seemed  nice but I haven't use it yet.i plan to use it when I travel oversea next month.the back cover will not stay on the phone,I have to put tape on it just to keep it close.i don't know if they sent me the wrong back cover or it's just a defective one!

ProductInfo.Features: SAMSUNG i627 PROPEL PRO AT&T; UNLOCKED WINDOWS CAMERA SMART PHONE
ProductInfo.Name: SAMSUNG i627 PROPEL PRO AT&T UNLOCKED GSM WINDOWS CAMERA SMART PHONE
